mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bim_grab..cinema_taobao (id, city_id, NAME, area, address, latitude, longitude, preferential, tel, json_md5) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preferential,jdbcType=BIT}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jsonMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE bim_grab..cinema_taobao SET city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, preferential = #{preferential,jdbcType=BIT}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, json_md5 = #{jsonMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id, city_id, name, area, address, latitude, longitude, preferential, tel, json_md5 FROM bim_grab..cinema_taobao WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT id, city_id, name, area, address, latitude, longitude, preferential, tel, json_md5 FROM bim_grab..cinema_taobao
